description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Beef Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Beef Bowl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide corn, rice, beans, salad leaves, tomatoes, avocado, capsicum and onion between 4 bowls. Top with beef and sprinkle with coriander and chilli. Serve with yoghurt and lime wedges.
